translation.en: -♪ Doin' me a real big favor ♪ -You look good tonight, baby.
translation.zh: 你今晚很美 宝贝

translation.en: [Marie] What?
translation.zh: 什么？

translation.en: I said you look beautiful tonight.
translation.zh: 我说你今晚很漂亮

translation.en: I can't hear you!
translation.zh: 我听不见你说话！

translation.en: [Malcolm] I said you look beautiful tonight, baby!
translation.zh: 我说你今晚很漂亮 宝贝！

translation.en: -[Marie] Thank you. -♪ When the cold wind comes ♪
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: -♪ It live at New York City ♪ -[Malcolm] Baby!
translation.zh: 宝贝！

translation.en: I'm a little wavy. But life is good.
translation.zh: 我有点得意忘形 因为人生很美好

translation.en: -Because we fucking did it! -[Marie] Did what?
translation.zh: -因为我们他妈成功了！ -什么成功了？

translation.en: I wrote and directed and premiered a movie
translation.zh: 我自编自导的电影

translation.en: that knocked the audience the fuck out tonight.
translation.zh: 在今晚首映式上他妈征服了观众

translation.en: Did you see that? -Did you see that audience? -[Marie] Hmm.
translation.zh: 你看见了吗？ 你看见观众的反应了吗？

translation.en: -Baby, did you see that audience? -Mm-hmm.
translation.zh: 你看见观众的反应了吗？

translation.en: I said, did you see the audience?
translation.zh: 你看见观众的反应了吗？

translation.en: Man, I delivered a fucking knockout punch.
translation.zh: 我把他们彻底征服了

translation.en: The last eight minutes straight, they were sobbing
translation.zh: 最后八分钟 观众都在流泪

translation.en: and when the credits hit, it was like a fucking bomb.
translation.zh: 当演职人员名单出现的时候 观众的鼓掌声那他妈叫一个热烈

translation.en: [imitates explosion] It's like a bomb went off.
translation.zh: 真是雷鸣般的掌声

translation.en: It feels good.
translation.zh: 感觉太好了

translation.en: [laughing] I cannot believe this is real. Baby, I can't believe this is real.
translation.zh: 我简直不敢相信这是真的 宝贝

translation.en: Afterwards, I talked to six critics. Six or seven of 'em.
translation.zh: 之后我和六个影评人谈了话 六个还是七个来着

translation.en: They was all on a nigga.
translation.zh: 他们对我交口称赞

translation.en: You feel me?
translation.zh: 你明白吗？

translation.en: The white guy from Variety loved it. The white guy from IndieWire loved it.
translation.zh: 《综艺》的那个白人很喜欢 独立电影网的那个白人很喜欢

translation.en: The white woman from the LA Times, she really loved it.
translation.zh: 《洛杉矶时报》的那白女人特别喜欢

translation.en: She kept saying that I'm the next Spike Lee,
translation.zh: 她不停说我是下一个斯派克李

translation.en: the next Barry Jenkins, the next John Singleton.
translation.zh: 下一个巴里杰金斯 下一个约翰辛格顿

translation.en: I just looked at her, like, "What about William Wyler?"
translation.zh: 我看着她 问了一句 “那我是下一个威廉惠勒吗？”

translation.en: You could tell, for three whole seconds, she was like, "Was William Wyler Black?"
translation.zh: 大概有整整三秒 她的表情就像是说 “威廉惠勒是黑人吗？”

translation.en: [chuckles] And then she realized, "Oh… shit. That's racist too."
translation.zh: 然后她突然意识到 “妈的 这也是种族歧视”

translation.en: She got flushed. Face red. That shit had me dying.
translation.zh: 然后她脸红了 看见她这样 我都快笑死了

translation.en: Marie, that was hilarious.
translation.zh: 玛丽 真的特搞笑

translation.en: And she kept stumbling over her words, saying shit like,
translation.zh: 然后她说话开始打结 说什么

translation.en: [imitating woman] "The movie was so emotional."
translation.zh: “电影情绪很饱满”

translation.en: "I-- Malcolm, I couldn't even think straight. Oh, my God, Malcolm."
translation.zh: “马尔科姆 我激动得有点迷糊了 哦 天啊 马尔科姆”

translation.en: "Just, just, Malcolm. Malcolm."
translation.zh: 不停地感叹“马尔科姆”

translation.en: Yeah, it was like a super white moment.
translation.zh: 简直就是一个白人风格很典型的时刻

translation.en: What was interesting, though,
translation.zh: 不过有意思的是

translation.en: was that you can tell that because I'm Black, as the director,
translation.zh: 我看得出来 就因为我这个导演是黑人

translation.en: and the woman is a Black lead, stars in the film,
translation.zh: 女主演也是黑人

translation.en: she's already trying to frame it through a political lens,
translation.zh: 她就一直用政治框定我的电影

translation.en: when in reality, it's a film about a girl trying to get clean.
translation.zh: 可其实这电影只不过是 讲一个女孩戒毒的故事

translation.en: Now, are there certain obstacles, because she's a Black woman?
translation.zh: 诚然 因为她是黑人女性 肯定会碰上一些障碍

translation.en: I mean, hell yeah.
translation.zh: 当然会

translation.en: Right? That's reality, too, but it's not a film about race.
translation.zh: 这确实是现实情况 可这电影探讨的不是种族问题

translation.en: No. It's about shame, it's about guilt, and how that shit is inescapable.
translation.zh: 完全不是 它探讨的是羞耻和内疚 以及它如何无法避免

translation.en: And it annoys me that so many of these journalists
translation.zh: 还有一点让我厌烦的是 很多记者

translation.en: can't help but to flex their college education.
translation.zh: 总是忍不住炫耀自己受过的大学教育

translation.en: Malcolm, you have a college education.
translation.zh: 马尔科姆 你也受过大学教育

translation.en: Yeah, but I'm not academic, baby. I'm not elitist about my shit.
translation.zh: 没错 可我不是学者 我的电影不搞精英主义

translation.en: I'm not trying to make a film for the three people
translation.zh: 我拍电影 不是为给媒体研究课上 我尊敬的三个人看

translation.en: in my media studies class that I respect.
translation.zh: 不是为给媒体研究课上 我尊敬的三个人看

translation.en: -I am a filmmaker. -Hmm.
translation.zh: 我是电影制作人

translation.en: -Right? -Mm-hmm.
translation.zh: 对吧？

translation.en: -Am I a filmmaker, baby? That's right. -Mm-hmm.
translation.zh: 我是电影制作人吗 宝贝？ 我是 说得没错

translation.en: And I'm going to be part of the larger conversation about filmmaking
translation.zh: 我一定要参与 电影制作中更广泛的议题

translation.en: without always having some white-ass writer
translation.zh: 不能让某些白人烂作者

translation.en: making it about race 'cause it's fucking convenient.
translation.zh: 总把我的电影往种族问题上扣 这么做也太他妈轻巧了

translation.en: You know, I could see-- I could see the reviews now.
translation.zh: 我现在都可以预料 这些人会怎么写影评

translation.en: It goes something like this. This is how they be writin' and shit.
translation.zh: 他们肯定会这么写

translation.en: [affectedly] "This film is an acute study of the horrors…"
translation.zh: “这部电影深刻呈现了 什么什么的‘恐怖’”

translation.en: They like to use words like that.
translation.zh: 他们喜欢用“恐怖”之类的词

translation.en: "…the horrors of systemic racism in this mental healthcare industry."
translation.zh: “…深刻呈现了心理保健行业 制度性种族歧视的恐怖”

translation.en: Instead of it being a commercial film
translation.zh: 而不说它是一部

translation.en: about a drug-addicted girl trying to get her shit together.
translation.zh: 讲述一个女孩努力戒毒的商业电影

translation.en: I mean, these people, these fucking people are so pedantic.
translation.zh: 这些影评人太他妈迂腐了

translation.en: -[R&B song playing softly] -They are. I mean, we get it.
translation.zh: 真迂腐 我们也知道他们迂腐

translation.en: You're smart. We get it. You're woke. We get it.
translation.zh: 影评人你很聪明 你是觉醒的人 我们知道

translation.en: Let us, us artists, have some fucking fun with the shit.
translation.zh: 所以就麻烦你们让我们这些 搞艺术的人开开心心搞艺术

translation.en: Let us have fun with the art.
translation.zh: 让我们开开心心搞艺术

translation.en: Malcolm, you're writing the Angela Davis biopic right now.
translation.zh: 你不是正在写 安吉拉戴维斯的传记片吗？

translation.en: Yeah, but that's different. That's different.
translation.zh: 没错 可这是两回事

translation.en: I'm choosing to make a film that's fundamentally political,
translation.zh: 我选择拍一部 在本质上探讨政治的电影

translation.en: but not everything I do is political because I'm Black.
translation.zh: 但不能因为我是黑人 就觉得我做的一切都关乎政治

translation.en: Yeah, I think Angela Davis would disagree with you.
translation.zh: 我觉得戴维斯应该不会认同你的看法

translation.en: -[laughing] She-- She would, huh? -Mm-hmm.
translation.zh: 没错

translation.en: For real, though, like, if I decide to make…
translation.zh: 不过说真的 如果哪天 我决定拍部乐高系列电影

translation.en: a fucking LEGO movie, it's not because I want to tell a story
translation.zh: 不过说真的 如果哪天 我决定拍部乐高系列电影 那么原因可能不是因为我想讲一个

translation.en: about how the building blocks of the American empire was slave labor.
translation.zh: 关于美帝国的基石是奴隶劳动的故事

translation.en: I may just wanna make a LEGO movie.
translation.zh: 而可能是我就是想拍乐高电影而已

translation.en: -You don't wanna make a LEGO movie. -[chuckles] Yeah, that's true.
translation.zh: -但你并不想拍乐高电影 -确实

translation.en: But that LEGO movie was fire. That shit was heat! Right?
translation.zh: 不过乐高电影特别火！

translation.en: And you've never gotten a good review in your life.
translation.zh: -对吧？ -你迄今还没得到过好的影评

translation.en: -Damn, baby, that's… You right, though. -[both laugh]
translation.zh: 妈的 这事…你说对了

translation.en: And you're complaining about reviews that haven't yet been written.
translation.zh: 而你这会儿还在为了 还没发表的影评发牢骚

translation.en: Right again.
translation.zh: 你又说对了

translation.en: So, stop. Makes you sound like an asshole.
translation.zh: 所以别发牢骚了 你这种牢骚听上去很混蛋

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 没错

translation.en: But shit, you know what I'm saying, though.
translation.zh: 但你知道我的意思

translation.en: Yeah, but save it for another day.
translation.zh: 没错 还是等影评出来了再发牢骚吧

translation.en: [Malcolm] Yeah.
translation.zh: 是啊

translation.en: You're complaining about the white girl from LA Times
translation.zh: 你吐槽《洛杉矶时报》的那个白女人

translation.en: 'cause she gave you a bad review that one time.
translation.zh: 无非是因为 她给你的一部电影写过差评

translation.en: Aw, she didn't just give a bad review.
translation.zh: 她可不止是给了差评

translation.en: She gave a dumb-ass review. There is a difference.
translation.zh: 她那影评完全是烂评 差评和烂评有本质区别

translation.en: Malcolm, you won. Okay?
translation.zh: 马尔科姆 你赢了 行吗？

translation.en: She's comparing you to Spike Lee and Barry Jenkins.
translation.zh: 她可把你比作了 斯派克李和巴里杰金斯

translation.en: But she's such a mediocre-ass writer.
translation.zh: 可她是个平庸的影评人

translation.en: Fine, you're not the next Spike Lee or Barry Jenkins.
translation.zh: 行 你不是下一个 斯派克李或巴里杰金斯

translation.en: -Doubt she knows who William Wyler is. -I don't know William Wyler.
translation.zh: -我怀疑她都不知道威廉惠勒是谁 -我也不知道

translation.en: -Is it ready, babe? -Mm-hmm. Here comes the mac and cheese.
translation.zh: 快做好了吗 宝贝？ 马上就可以吃奶酪通心粉了

translation.en: -You don't know who William Wyler is? -No.
translation.zh: -你不知道威廉惠勒是谁？ -不知道

translation.en: Oh, man. He did The Best Years of Our Lives.
translation.zh: 天啊 他是《黄金时代》的导演

translation.en: Sh-- Shit was heat. Ben-Hur?
translation.zh: 那电影特别火 《宾虚》也是他导的

translation.en: He's one of the most versatile filmmakers of all time. I mean, Wuthering Heights.
translation.zh: 他是多才多艺的一个电影人 还导过《呼啸山庄》

translation.en: Heads-up.
translation.zh: 重磅的来了

translation.en: Roman Holiday.
translation.zh: 《罗马假日》也是他导的

translation.en: Yeah, some classics.
translation.zh: 都是经典作品

translation.en: It's different, though. You don't work in film.
translation.zh: 不过不一样 你又不是搞电影的

translation.en: You're right, Malcolm, I don't.
translation.zh: 没错 马尔科姆 我不是

translation.en: Did you have fun tonight? -[Marie] It was nice. -[chuckles]
translation.zh: -你今晚过得开心吗？ -不错

translation.en: "Nice."
translation.zh: “不错”

translation.en: The entire night while I was talking to all those sweet, smiling, rich people who,
translation.zh: 我整晚都在跟那些富人聊天 他们脸上堆着笑容 显得十分亲切

translation.en: a month ago, wouldn't give me the time of day, I just kept looking at you.
translation.zh: 这些人一个月前鸟都不鸟我 当时我一直看着你

translation.en: And I think to myself, "God, you're the most gorgeous creature on planet Earth."
translation.zh: 心里想着 “天啊 你简直是地球上最美的人”

translation.en: [kisses] And the sexiest too.
translation.zh: 也是最性感的人

translation.en: I mean, there's nobody sexier. Even Anthony said it.
translation.zh: 没人比你性感 安东尼也是这么说的

translation.en: [kisses] I mean, not in a bad way.
translation.zh: 我意思不是指那种不好的性感

translation.en: -[kisses] In a positive way. -Hmm.
translation.zh: 是指那种好的性感

translation.en: When I'd see you…
translation.zh: 当我看着你…

translation.en: with your cranberry and soda…
translation.zh: 手里拿着蔓越莓苏打水…

translation.en: smiling, chopping it up…
translation.zh: 和人谈笑风生的时候

translation.en: And I'd think, "God, how fucking lucky am I?"
translation.zh: 我心想 “天啊 我他妈怎么这么幸运？”

translation.en: -I couldn't wait to get you home. -Aww, that's so sweet.
translation.zh: -然后我就迫不及待想和你赶紧回家 -说得真浪漫

translation.en: Hold your cute little ass and kiss it.
translation.zh: 想抓着你的小美臀一个劲亲吻

translation.en: Tell you that I love you.
translation.zh: 想跟你说我爱你

translation.en: I love you, Marie.
translation.zh: 我爱你 玛丽

translation.en: -Do you want salted or unsalted butter? -[softly] I'll just have you.
translation.zh: 你想要加盐还是不加盐的黄油？ 我只想要你

translation.en: What was that?
translation.zh: 这是什么意思？

translation.en: -What? -That was a fake-ass smile.
translation.zh: -什么？ -你在假笑

translation.en: -No, it wasn't. -Swear to God, it was.
translation.zh: -我没假笑 -你那绝对是假笑

translation.en: [Marie] No, it wasn't. It was nothing.
translation.zh: 没有 没有假笑

translation.en: Bullshit, I can fucking read you. I know when nothing is something.
translation.zh: 鬼扯 我能看出你的心思 你有没有假笑我看得出来

translation.en: Well, maybe you can't read me.
translation.zh: 也许你不能看出我的心思

translation.en: No, I can read you.
translation.zh: 不 我看得出来

translation.en: -I haven't eaten all night. -That's not what this is.
translation.zh: -那是因为我整晚都没吃东西 -不是这个原因

translation.en: It's 1:00 in the morning. Can we eat and go to sleep?
translation.zh: 现在是凌晨一点 我们吃点东西就睡觉好吗？

translation.en: Please, Marie. I really don't wanna fight tonight.
translation.zh: 拜托 玛丽 我今晚真的不想吵架

translation.en: Neither do I. That is why I'm making you mac and cheese.
translation.zh: 我也不想 所以我才给你做奶酪通心粉

translation.en: So you are angry.
translation.zh: 这么说你现在确实生气了

translation.en: No.
translation.zh: 没有

translation.en: -Was it the thing that Anthony said? -No.
translation.zh: -是不是因为安东尼说的话？ -不是

translation.en: -The joke about you being a model? -No.
translation.zh: -拿你模特说笑？ -不是

translation.en: Wouldn't take it seriously. He's old and from a totally different era.
translation.zh: 你别当真 他年纪大 想法和我们完全不是一个时代的

translation.en: I didn't take it personally.
translation.zh: 我没往心里去

translation.en: -Promise? -Promise.
translation.zh: -当真？ -当真

translation.en: -Was it Taylor? -No.
translation.zh: -是因为泰勒吗？ -不是

translation.en: -You sure? -Yes.
translation.zh: -确定吗？ -确定

translation.en: -I know you get weird around Taylor. -I do not get weird around Taylor.
translation.zh: -你在泰勒旁边时举止很奇怪 -我在她旁边时举止没有很奇怪

translation.en: -You get meek. -"Meek"? Huh, really?
translation.zh: -你会变成一副温顺的样子 -“温顺”？真的假的？

translation.en: -Well, you don't talk a lot. -Well, that's different from being meek.
translation.zh: -你会变得很沉默 -沉默和温顺是两回事

translation.en: -I just mean-- -What?
translation.zh: -我是说… -什么？

translation.en: Meek implies that I'm shy or small. That she's the queen of fucking England.
translation.zh: 温顺暗指害羞或者畏缩 你当她是他妈英国女王呢？

translation.en: -I didn't mean it like that. I meant-- -What?
translation.zh: 我不是那个意思 我是指… 指什么？

translation.en: What?
translation.zh: 指什么？

translation.en: -She's a movie star. -Hmm.
translation.zh: 她是电影明星

translation.en: -She's about to become a movie star. -Don't jinx her, Malcolm.
translation.zh: -她马上就会成为电影明星 -你这么说会给她带来霉运的

translation.en: I have nothing nice to say to Taylor, so I don't talk to Taylor.
translation.zh: 我和她没什么好说的 所以我才沉默

translation.en: -It has nothing to do with being meek. -It's just… she notices.
translation.zh: -这可不是温顺 -可是她注意到了

translation.en: Really?
translation.zh: 是吗？

translation.en: -Really. -How do you know?
translation.zh: -是的 -你怎么知道的？

translation.en: -'Cause I just do. -Really?
translation.zh: -我看得出来 -是吗？

translation.en: She sees how you are with other people. You're talkative. You're funny.
translation.zh: 她看见过你和别人相处时的样子 很健谈 很幽默

translation.en: What can I say? I'm personable.
translation.zh: 这大概说明我挺讨人喜欢的吧

translation.en: [chuckles] Right. Which is what makes her insecure.
translation.zh: 没错 所以这就让她没有安全感

translation.en: What does? Other fucking human beings with personalities?
translation.zh: 什么让她没有安全感？ 其他他妈有个性的人吗？

translation.en: [chuckles] No. The fact that you're not yourself and she sees it.
translation.zh: 不 是你在她旁边和在别人旁边时 判若两人让她没安全感

translation.en: She'll survive.
translation.zh: 她能挺过去的

translation.en: So why you angry?
translation.zh: 那你为什么生气？

translation.en: Marie, you're angry.
translation.zh: 玛丽 你确实是在生气

translation.en: Marie, what you angry about?
translation.zh: 玛丽 为什么生气？

translation.en: Marie. -Marie? -[dish clatters] Marie! Marie.
translation.zh: 玛丽！

translation.en: Marie, talk to me.
translation.zh: 玛丽 你说话呀

translation.en: I promise you, it's not a good idea. Let's just talk tomorrow.
translation.zh: 现在谈这事绝对不是好主意 我们明天再谈吧

translation.en: -But you're upset with me. -It's not that big of a deal.
translation.zh: -我知道你是对我不爽 -没什么大不了的

translation.en: I can't go to bed knowing you're angry.
translation.zh: 你生气会让我睡不着觉

translation.en: Malcolm, I promise you,
translation.zh: 马尔科姆 我跟你保证

translation.en: nothing productive is going to be said tonight.
translation.zh: 我们现在谈这事绝对没好处

translation.en: -How do you know? -Because I know you.
translation.zh: -你怎么知道？ -因为我了解你

translation.en: -What does that mean? -And I love you.
translation.zh: -这是什么意思？ -而且我爱你

translation.en: What does that mean?
translation.zh: 这是什么意思？

translation.en: It means you are literally incapable of de-escalating a situation
translation.zh: 意思是 出状况的时候 你完全没法让事态降温

translation.en: unless it's work-related. Even then, it's 50-50.
translation.zh: 哪怕是工作上的状况 被你成功降温的概率都只是一半

translation.en: [blows raspberry] Why is it that anytime anything good happens,
translation.zh: 为什么每次有好事发生的时候

translation.en: you have to find something, anything,
translation.zh: 你总要找一些事情…

translation.en: the most minor fucking detail to harp on, to make ugly,
translation.zh: 一些鸡毛蒜皮的事情 让自己怄气 破坏气氛

translation.en: to ensure that there's no reason to fucking celebrate.
translation.zh: 搞到最后我们没法庆祝？

translation.en: -Really? You wanna go there? -Yes.

translation.en: -Okay. -All right, then. What is it?

translation.en: -Your speech, Malcolm. -Oh, give me a break.
translation.zh: -因为你的发言 马尔科姆 -拜托

translation.en: You're outside of your mind.

translation.en: When I said you find the most minor detail to make it ugly, I meant it.
translation.zh: 我说你总会找鸡毛蒜皮的事情 搞得大家都不开心 一点都没错

translation.en: [grunts] You forgot to thank me, Malcolm. It's not a minor detail. That's a big one.

translation.en: But I've thanked you a million times before.
translation.zh: 可我之前已经感谢过你无数次了

translation.en: You know that I'm thankful. You know I'm appreciative.
translation.zh: 我心怀感激和感恩 这是你知道的

translation.en: You know I made a mistake, so why turn it into something more?

translation.en: Because it is more. What?
translation.zh: -这不是小题 -什么？

translation.en: It's our entire fucking relationship in a nutshell.

translation.en: -Oh, you can't be serious. -I'm dead serious.

translation.en: -You're psychotic. -You're hyperbolic.
translation.zh: -你有病 -你夸张

translation.en: I'm not. It's psychotic to think

translation.en: that forgetting to thank you is symbolic of anything
translation.zh: 我忘了感谢你 就纯粹只是忘了感谢你

translation.en: other than me legitimately forgetting to fucking thank you.
translation.zh: 你竟然觉得这代表别的意思

translation.en: You thanked 112 fucking people tonight.
translation.zh: 你今晚致谢了他妈112个人

translation.en: You thanked your mother, your gaffer, your agents, your third grade teacher,
translation.zh: 包括你妈、你的灯光指导 你的经纪人、你三年级的老师

translation.en: the usher at the theater when you were 12 and saw whatever the fuck.

translation.en: -Didn't thank the usher. -You know what I mean.

translation.en: You don't have to be sarcastic, petty and obnoxious about the shit.
translation.zh: 你没必要讽刺、小气、惹人讨厌

translation.en: I'm sorry. I forgot to thank you.
translation.zh: 对不起 忘了感谢你是我的错

translation.en: I am genuinely sorry,
translation.zh: 我真心感到抱歉

translation.en: which is why I apologized to you a thousand times during the movie.

translation.en: I felt so guilty, I couldn't concentrate on the movie.

translation.en: Huh. That's a shame. You've only seen it 7,000 times.

translation.en: Every time I'd lean over and said, "I'm sorry," you said it was fine.
translation.zh: 可每次我转头跟你说对不起的时候 你不是都说没事吗？

translation.en: You squeezed my hand and said it was fine.

translation.en: You said, "I love you. Don't worry. It's fine."

translation.en: Well, Malcolm, I changed my mind.

translation.en: How can you just change your mind?

translation.en: Honestly, it's pretty fucking easy.

translation.en: That doesn't seem a little crazy to you?

translation.en: -Nope. -It doesn't?

translation.en: -Nope. -Why?

translation.en: Well, because when I was in the theater, it didn't matter.

translation.en: Wasn't that big of a deal. It was fine.

translation.en: "You know, I bet you're probably a little bit upset right now
translation.zh: “你现在肯定有些难过吧

translation.en: because he forgot to thank you, but you know how much he depends on you."

translation.en: -Yeah. She told me not to read into it. -What the hell does that mean?

translation.en: Funny you should say that. That's the exact thought I had.

translation.en: -I didn't cheat on you. -I didn't ask.

translation.en: -Just saying-- -Didn't ask.

translation.en: -Well, I'm just saying-- -I didn't ask.
translation.zh: -我意思只是… -我没问这问题

translation.en: It's not just about you forgetting to thank me, Malcolm.

translation.en: It's about how you see me.

translation.en: And how you view my contribution, not just to this relationship,

translation.en: but to your work.

translation.en: Specifically in a movie you made about my life.

translation.en: you are genuinely… unstable.

translation.en: I'm not kidding!

translation.en: Do you know how disturbing it is

translation.en: Agents, producers, crew members, actors,
translation.zh: 经纪人、制片人、工作人员、演员

translation.en: fucking fictional characters get more respect

translation.en: and empathy from you than I do.

translation.en: I mean, I'm not that bad.

translation.en: -[softly] Yes! -[chuckles softly]

translation.zh: 马尔科姆 你现在尽管笑吧 但我能预见到这种事会来的 是真的

translation.en: [Marie] All your new Twitter friends will be quote-tweeting your ass,
translation.zh: 以后不管你在推特上发什么 哪怕是鬼扯 你推特上新增的推友

translation.en: handclaps and shit, talkin' 'bout, "This is what change looks like."
translation.zh: 都会鼓掌或转发 说：“这就是改变应有的样子”

translation.en: "Yes, king!" -[Malcolm] Oh, brutal. -Mm-hmm.
translation.zh: -“老大 你真棒！” -你太犀利了

translation.en: But the rest of America will be like,
translation.zh: 可我们的其他国人却会说

translation.en: "What the fuck is this Negro doing selling us some shit with these LEGOs?"
translation.zh: “这黑鬼拍的是什么烂电影？ 把乐高系列电影糟践成这样”

translation.en: "I'm not seein' that shit."
translation.zh: “我才不看这烂电影”

translation.en: Then there's gonna be boycotts, fucking protests
translation.zh: 然后就会有人抵制、抗议

translation.en: because you're politicizing these LEGOs,
translation.zh: 说你把乐高电影政治化了

translation.en: but thankfully, you'll have your new white girlfriend from the LA Times.
translation.zh: 不过好在你的新女友 是《洛杉矶时报》的白女人

translation.en: I mean, she's gonna come ridin' in with her SPF-50 brigade
translation.zh: 她肯定会号召她那帮 热衷带子女参加体育活动的

translation.en: -on some real soccer mom shit… -[Malcolm laughing]
translation.zh: 白人大部队来救场

translation.en: …tweetin' at people left and right.
translation.zh: 发推跟左右两派的人都呼吁

translation.en: "Well, this is literally censorship!"
translation.zh: “这简直就是在搞审查！”

translation.en: "Who is in charge here?"
translation.zh: “现在到底听谁的？”

translation.en: "It is our moral obligation to go and see this movie
translation.zh: “我们有道德上的义务 去看这样一部电影

translation.en: written and directed by a real Bla… I mean, person of color."
translation.zh: 它的编剧和导演是一位真正的黑… 有色人”

translation.en: "We are gonna make history, okay?"
translation.zh: “我们一定会创造历史 明白吗？”

translation.en: "We're going to make it the biggest box office ever."
translation.zh: “我们一定会让这部电影 取得史上最高的票房”

translation.en: And the next thing you know,
translation.zh: 然后你猜会怎么着？

translation.en: you will have made a toy company a billion dollars.
translation.zh: 你会帮这家玩具公司赚到十亿美金

translation.en: -[laughs] Yes! -Yes!
translation.zh: -太好了！ -太好了！

translation.en: "Congratulations, Malcolm Elliot! You fucking did it!"
translation.zh: “恭喜你 马尔科姆艾略特！ 你终于他妈成功了！”

translation.en: "Here's a couple million dollars and a fuckin' fruit basket."
translation.zh: “这是他妈几百万美金和一只果篮”

translation.en: "But just as a thought, have you ever considered
translation.zh: “对了 我有一个想法 你有考虑过

translation.en: doing the Angela Davis biopic, but with LEGOs?"
translation.zh: 把安吉拉戴维斯的传记片 拍成乐高系电影吗？”

translation.en: [Malcolm] You know your white voice is crazy.
translation.zh: 你这白人嗓音模仿得太像了

translation.en: -[Marie] You laugh, but… -That's funny.
translation.zh: -你只管笑吧 可说真的… -很可爱

translation.en: [Marie] You could change the world.
translation.zh: 你有可能会改变世界

translation.en: [Malcolm] You should've never given up acting, baby.
translation.zh: 你不该放弃演戏的 宝贝

translation.en: [Marie chuckles] Why, Malcolm?
translation.zh: 为什么这么说？

translation.en: [Malcolm] I always believed if you found a character
translation.zh: 我一直相信 如果你有机会饰演

translation.en: that actually allowed you to be yourself, you'd be astonishing.
translation.zh: 那种能让你释放自我的角色 你会让世界惊叹

translation.en: Well, Malcolm…
translation.zh: 可问题是…

translation.en: unfortunately no one can really write me except you.
translation.zh: 很不幸 除了你 没人能写好我的故事

translation.en: [Malcolm singing along] ♪ Have I told you ♪ ♪ Lately that I love you? ♪
translation.zh: 我最近是否告诉过你 我爱你？

translation.en: ♪ Well, if I didn't, darling, I'm sorry ♪
translation.zh: 抱歉

translation.en: ♪ Did I reach out And hold you in my loving arms ♪
translation.zh: 拥抱你…

translation.en: ♪ In my loving arms ♪
translation.zh: 在我充满爱的怀里

translation.en: ♪ Oh, when you needed me? ♪
translation.zh: 当你需要我的时候？

translation.en: ♪ Now I realize that you need love too ♪
translation.zh: 我明白到你也需要爱

translation.en: ♪ And I'll spend my life Making love to you ♪
translation.zh: 我这辈子与你做爱

translation.en: ♪ Oh, I forgot to be your lover ♪
translation.zh: 却忘了好好爱你

translation.en: ♪ And I'm sorry, I'm so sorry… ♪
translation.zh: 我很抱歉

translation.en: Marie!
translation.zh: 玛丽！

translation.zh: 玛丽 别玩捉迷藏了

translation.en: Marie!
translation.zh: 玛丽！

translation.en: Shit.
translation.zh: 妈的

translation.en: Marie!
translation.zh: 玛丽！

translation.en: [Malcolm] Marie, stop playin'.
translation.zh: 玛丽 别玩了

translation.en: Marie!
translation.zh: 玛丽！

translation.en: Marie!
translation.zh: 玛丽！

translation.en: Marie!
translation.zh: 玛丽！

translation.en: Shit.
translation.zh: 妈的

translation.en: Marie.
translation.zh: 玛丽

translation.en: Marie!
translation.zh: 玛丽！

translation.en: Oh, my God!
translation.zh: 我的天！

translation.en: -Where the fuck did you go? -To pee.
translation.zh: -你他妈去哪儿了？ -撒尿

translation.en: -To pee-- Where? -Outside.
translation.zh: -在哪儿撒尿？ -外面

translation.en: Why didn't you just use the bathroom?
translation.zh: 干嘛不用洗手间？

translation.en: Because I didn't grow up with a backyard.
translation.zh: 因为我从小住的房子不像这里有后院

translation.en: -The novelty hasn't worn off yet. -Jesus!
translation.zh: -我的新鲜劲还没过去 -天啊！

translation.en: You know, you are the neediest man I have ever dated.
translation.zh: 你知道吗？ 你是我约会过的最粘人的男人

translation.en: But at the same time, you are also the least jealous man I have ever dated.
translation.zh: 可同时你又是 我约会过的最不会吃醋的男人

translation.en: I mean, I could literally be hanging on some random guy's arm
translation.zh: 我就算是随便挽着哪个男人的胳膊

translation.en: and you would never think it's sexual.
translation.zh: 你从来都不会觉得这有什么问题

translation.en: You'd just come up to me and be like, "Hey, babe. What the hell are you doing?"
translation.zh: 你只会走过来跟我说 “喂 宝贝 你在干什么呢？”

translation.en: "I need your help. I can't remember anybody's name here. Let's go."
translation.zh: “我需要你帮忙 这儿谁的名字我都不记得 咱们走吧”

translation.en: -But whose arm are you hanging on? -That's it. Doesn't matter.
translation.zh: -你挽着谁的胳膊？ -这根本不重要

translation.en: -[Malcolm] Is this about tonight? -Mmm.
translation.zh: 是因为今晚的事吗？

translation.en: Kinda.
translation.zh: 算是吧

translation.en: -"Kinda"? -Hmm.
translation.zh: “算是”？

translation.en: I was outside smoking and you were in here
translation.zh: 我在外面抽烟的时候 你坐在这里

translation.en: apologizing in whatever emotionally obtuse way made sense to you.
translation.zh: 用你觉得合理的方式道歉 你对别人的情绪感觉很迟钝

translation.en: As if a song written 50 years ago about a different fucking girl
translation.zh: 你以为一首50年前写的 讲述另外一个女孩的歌

translation.en: would somehow make me feel better about our relationship.
translation.zh: 能让我对我俩关系的感受改善一点

translation.en: Some people would say lack of jealousy is a good thing.
translation.zh: 有的人会说不爱吃醋是件好事

translation.en: -Not when it borders on indifference. -What are you talkin' about, Marie?
translation.zh: -不爱吃醋到毫不在意可不是好事 -你到底想说什么？

translation.en: Malcolm, you can encourage me to have a life of my own,
translation.zh: 马尔科姆 虽然你鼓励我要有自己的生活

translation.en: but that's just… That's bullshit.
translation.zh: 可这种话就是胡扯

translation.en: You don't want me to have a life that is separate from yours
translation.zh: 你其实并不希望我有独立于你的生活

translation.en: because you are too fucking needy.
translation.zh: 因为你太需要别人了

translation.en: Thought we were done fighting.
translation.zh: 我还以为我们已经吵完了

translation.en: -Don't be sensitive. This isn't a fight. -Yeah, right.
translation.zh: -别太敏感 这不是吵架 -这不叫吵架吗？

translation.en: It's not. It's an observation.
translation.zh: 这不是吵架 是观察

translation.en: -Tsk. Oh, you don't wanna go there. -Why?
translation.zh: -你最好别跟我说这个 -为什么？

translation.en: -Trust me, you don't. -Why?
translation.zh: -相信我吧 -为什么？

translation.en: Even if you do, you're not thinking clearly.
translation.zh: 就算你要说 你现在脑子也不清醒

translation.en: -I think I'm thinking clearly. -Trust me, you're not.
translation.zh: -我觉得我现在脑子清醒得很 -相信我 你现在不清醒

translation.en: -I do have a slightly masochistic streak. -But you're not dumb.
translation.zh: -我是有点受虐狂倾向 -可你并不傻

translation.en: -Oh, my God. Thank you. -Don't be a fucking brat.
translation.zh: -天啊 难得你这么夸我 -别耍滑头

translation.en: Don't patronize me and tell me I gave up something
translation.zh: 别一副居高临下的样子 跟我说我放弃了一些东西

translation.en: when you know damn well your work is all that you have time for and all you care about.
translation.zh: 你十分清楚你的工作 是你唯一有时间做、唯一在意的事情

translation.en: Oh, so you gave up a career in acting to be an emotional fucking support dog.
translation.zh: 于是你只好放弃演员职业 成为我的情感支持宠物 是吗？

translation.en: -Fuck you, Malcolm! -I get it now.
translation.zh: -去你的 马尔科姆！ -我现在懂了

translation.en: -Fuck you! -'Cause you're scared, you didn't want it.
translation.zh: -去你的！ -你其实是害怕 就不想尝试

translation.en: You never wanted it.
translation.zh: 从来都不想尝试

translation.en: -'Cause you're scared to try and fail. -You are ugly inside.
translation.zh: -因为你害怕尝试后会失败 -你内心真他妈丑陋

translation.en: No, fuck you!
translation.zh: 去你的 才不是！

translation.en: Marie, when I met you, you were a fucking pilled-out disaster.
translation.zh: 玛丽 我刚遇见你的时候 你的毒瘾简直他妈不可救药

translation.en: You were barely 20 years old.
translation.zh: 你那时才刚满20岁

translation.en: Couldn't hold a conversation without noddin' off,
translation.zh: 和别人说话时 总是要么睡着 要么昏迷

translation.en: or passin' out, or breaking down.
translation.zh: 要么情绪失控 根本没法对话

translation.en: Don't act like for the last five years you became so enlightened that I fucking…
translation.zh: 不要以为这五年来 你变得很明智 我就…忘了以前的你是什么样

translation.en: forgot the old you.
translation.zh: 你变得很明智 我就…忘了以前的你是什么样

translation.en: -Of course I want you to have a life. -[sighs]
translation.zh: 我当然是真心希望你有自己的生活

translation.en: You know why? Because I'm terrified that if you don't, you're gonna hang everything on mine.
translation.zh: 因为不然的话 我害怕你什么事情都要依赖我

translation.en: And when, God forbid, I forget to thank you at a movie premiere,
translation.zh: 搞得如果我忘了 在电影首映式上感谢你

translation.en: you come home, you start a fight, and by morning you're drinking on Xannies,
translation.zh: 你回家之后就要和我吵架 第二天早上用酒送佳静安定

translation.en: trying to fuckin' cut your wrists with a pair of fucking nail scissors.
translation.zh: 还要用他妈指甲剪割腕自残

translation.en: Malcolm, I want you to leave this room.
translation.zh: 请你出去

translation.en: Oh, shut the fuck up, Marie. You know, I get it. I really do.
translation.zh: 你闭嘴 玛丽 我告诉你 我明白你是怎么回事了

translation.en: You have pain and fucking disappointment and dreams
translation.zh: 你心里有痛苦、失望和梦想

translation.en: like everybody else on planet Earth.
translation.zh: 就跟地球上所有人一样

translation.en: You're mad you didn't get the jobs you wish you'd got.
translation.zh: 你恼火是因为 你没得到你希望得到的工作

translation.en: You're embarrassed you had to play "Skinny Girl In Alley"
translation.zh: 你很难堪 别人只让你演“巷子里的瘦女孩”

translation.en: and "Concerned Nurse Number Two."
translation.zh: 以及“关心病人的二号护士”

translation.en: Well, guess what? None of us are proud of where we first start off.
translation.zh: 可你知道吗？没有谁一出道就很风光

translation.en: I started off, I had to do token fuckin' punch up on straight to VOD rom-coms,
translation.zh: 我出道时给网络浪漫喜剧剧本 搞过微不足道的润色

translation.en: and under-the-table rewrites on films that didn't wanna pay writers!
translation.zh: 帮那些不想付钱给编剧的片方 偷偷摸摸重写剧本！

translation.en: But you keep working!
translation.zh: 但我们还是得继续干！

translation.en: You keep on trying! You work harder and harder
translation.zh: 继续努力！加油再加油

translation.en: 'cause even if you're not talented, which you are,
translation.zh: 因为就算我们没有才华 不过你有才华

translation.en: you can still get somewhere, as long as you don't have an ego.
translation.zh: 只要我们没有虚妄的自负 我们依然能取得成绩

translation.en: You don't have to be proud of everything you do!
translation.zh: 你做的事情没必要 样样都值得你自豪才行！

translation.en: But you do have to work harder than 99% of people.
translation.zh: 但你必须比99%的人都要努力

translation.en: You know what's bullshit? What's a fucking cop-out, Marie?
translation.zh: 你知道什么是胡说八道吗？ 知道什么是逃避吗 玛丽？

translation.en: Is you acting like my work is so fucking suffocating
translation.zh: 就是你表现得好像我的工作令你窒息

translation.en: that you can't even breathe, that you don't have any fucking space.
translation.zh: 以至于你没法呼吸 没有了任何个人空间

translation.en: I mean, look around.
translation.zh: 你好好看看我们周围

translation.en: Look at this fucking house the production company put us up in.
translation.zh: 好好看看制片公司 让我们待的这间屋子

translation.en: Pick a room, get to fucking work,
translation.zh: 你还是选个房间去好好干活吧

translation.en: and stop blaming me for your inabilities to get your shit together!
translation.zh: 别再埋怨是我让你没法振作起来！

translation.en: I checked you into rehab.
translation.zh: 当初是我安排你进康复中心戒毒

translation.en: I went to group therapy with you. I've been with you.
translation.zh: 我和你一起参加团体治疗 我陪着你

translation.en: I fucking supported you every single step of the way.
translation.zh: 你戒毒过程的每一步 我他妈都支持你

translation.en: When you were depressed,
translation.zh: 你抑郁的时候

translation.en: when you were on so many meds that you couldn't fuck for half a year,
translation.zh: 你因为服很多药 整整半年没法和我上床的时候

translation.en: I was there for you.
translation.zh: 我一直陪着你

translation.en: When you relapsed, I was there for you.
translation.zh: 你复吸的时候 我对你不离不弃

translation.en: When we lived on 38th Street and you went out to that meeting, right?
translation.zh: 还记得我们住在38号街的时候 你出去参加会面那次吗？

translation.en: And you went to the meeting and you didn't come home
translation.zh: 你去了之后没有回家

translation.en: because you were fucking somebody else, right?
translation.zh: 因为你和别人搞上了 记得吗？

translation.en: Guess who was there for you?
translation.zh: 你还记得谁依然守着你吗？

translation.en: This nigga right here.
translation.zh: 正是在下

translation.en: So, don't go there.
translation.zh: 所以你不要跟我说这些

translation.en: Do not fucking go there because you are not gonna win this one, Marie.
translation.zh: 不要他妈跟我说这些 因为这个你赢不了的 玛丽

translation.en: Trust me.
translation.zh: 相信我

translation.en: All right, how about we cut the bullshit, Malcolm?
translation.zh: 行 那我们就别再避重就轻了 马尔科姆

translation.en: Since everybody's being honest tonight, how about you be honest? Hmm?
translation.zh: 既然今晚大家都他妈很诚实 不如你也诚实一下？

translation.en: About the real reason you were there for me.
translation.zh: 说说你一直陪着我的真实原因吧

translation.en: I was good fucking material.
translation.zh: 真实原因是我他妈是很好的素材

translation.en: Hmm? That's why you stuck by me.
translation.zh: 所以你才对我不离不弃

translation.en: Because I was a story.
translation.zh: 因为我的经历是个好故事

translation.en: It was a world of emotions you weren't used to seeing so fucking close.
translation.zh: 充满了各种各样 你从没近距离观察过的情绪

translation.en: And because I was 20 years old and I'd never been loved the way you loved me
translation.zh: 而且因为我当年才20岁 从来没被人像你那样爱过

translation.en: or thought you loved me, I didn't realize what I was to you.
translation.zh: 或者说以为被你爱过 我以前一直没明白我对你意味着什么

translation.en: A fucking movie. A tragedy.
translation.zh: 原来我不过是他妈一部电影 一场悲剧

translation.en: One that you could continue watching for as long as you were there for me.
translation.zh: 一个你只要一直陪着 就能一直观察的素材

translation.en: And tonight, in that fucking audience, I watched the whole shit play out.
translation.zh: 今晚我就和那些观众一起 看了一部根据我的经历拍出的电影

translation.en: So don't pretend like it was a selfless fucking act, Malcolm.
translation.zh: 所以别装出一副你不求回报的样子

translation.en: It's literally the basis of your art and it is the reason
translation.zh: 我的经历可以说 是你这件艺术作品的基石 也是因为这个

translation.en: why all these people are calling you brilliant and brave and fearless.
translation.zh: 你今天才得到了众人的称赞 说你有才华、有勇气

translation.en: "So tell us, Malcolm."
translation.zh: “马尔科姆 跟我们说说”

translation.en: "How were you able to breathe life into the character of Imani?"
translation.zh: “你是怎么做到 让伊玛妮这个角色如此真实的？”

translation.en: "How were you able to channel the voice of a young woman
translation.zh: “你是怎么做到 将一位年轻女性的内心呈现得

translation.en: so well, so authentically?"
translation.zh: 如此到位、如此真实的？”

translation.en: "Well, Jennifer, that's a good question. I guess you could say I stole it."
translation.zh: “詹妮弗 你这是个好问题” “可以说这是我偷来的”

translation.en: "I ripped it off."
translation.zh: “是我盗窃来的”

translation.en: "Not a literal theft, a spiritual one."
translation.zh: “偷的不是实物 是精神上的东西”

translation.en: You're a fucking fraud.
translation.zh: 你就他妈是个骗子

translation.en: The reason you didn't thank me tonight is because you already know that.
translation.zh: 你今晚没感谢我 是因为你自己已经知道了

translation.en: [scoffing] You have nothing new to say.
translation.zh: 你自己无法创造新的东西

translation.en: [laughs] All you can do is fuckin' mimic.
translation.zh: 所以你只好他妈模仿

translation.en: Be a fucking parakeet, a goddamn cockatoo.
translation.zh: 当一只模仿别人的鹦鹉

translation.en: I mean, God forbid you are ever alone,
translation.zh: 但愿你不会一个人待着

translation.en: and have to dream up another original idea.
translation.zh: 不得不独自想出一个有创意的点子

translation.en: What are you going to write, Malcolm?
translation.zh: 这种情况下你能写出什么东西来？

translation.en: Yourself?
translation.zh: 写你自己？

translation.en: Give me a fucking break.
translation.zh: 别他妈逗我了

translation.en: You don't have the balls. [slaps leg]
translation.zh: 你才没种

translation.en: You don't have the gravitas, the fucking introspection to look at yourself
translation.zh: 你没有那种严肃和自省能力

translation.en: and your flaws and your shortcomings
translation.zh: 检视你的缺点和不足

translation.en: and the fact that you may not be the next Spike Lee or Barry Jenkins
translation.zh: 反省自己可能无法成为 下一个斯派克李或者巴里杰金斯

translation.en: because those motherfuckers had something new to say.
translation.zh: 因为那些人能够创新

translation.en: Something true to themselves and their fucking experience.
translation.zh: 敢于面对自己和自己的体验

translation.en: You say the film is about shame and guilt. -[pouring liquid] -Correct?
translation.zh: 你说你这部电影 探讨的是羞耻和内疚 对吗？

translation.en: Your words, not mine.
translation.zh: 这可是你说的 不是我说的

translation.en: All right. Well, I have a question for you, Malcolm.
translation.zh: 那好 我问你个问题 马尔科姆

translation.en: Whose fucking shame?
translation.zh: 是谁的羞耻？

translation.en: Whose guilt?
translation.zh: 谁的内疚？

translation.en: What the fuck do you know about shame and guilt?
translation.zh: 你他妈对羞耻和内疚懂什么？

translation.en: You have two parents, no bad habits other than being a fucking prick,
translation.zh: 你的父母双双健在 你除了卑鄙之外没有恶习

translation.en: and a college education.
translation.zh: 你受过大学教育

translation.en: Your mother is a therapist. Your father is a professor.
translation.zh: 你妈是心理治疗师 你爸是教授

translation.en: Your sister works for a think tank in D.C.
translation.zh: 你姐在华盛顿的智库工作

translation.en: But out here, on these streets, these smiling fucking rich people,
translation.zh: 可今天在首映式上 那些对你满脸笑意的富人

translation.en: they think you know what it's like to scrap.
translation.zh: 他们以为你明白 过坎坷的生活是什么滋味

translation.en: Think you fucking lived it. Give me a break.
translation.zh: 以为你他妈有过那种经历 别逗我了

translation.en: You're more privileged than the white girl who works for the LA Times,
translation.zh: 你的生活比《洛杉矶时报》 那个白女人还要优越

translation.en: who thinks she's doing a public service by lifting up your mediocre ass.
translation.zh: 她心里想的是抬举你这平庸之辈 也算是做公益了

translation.en: Now you're being cruel.
translation.zh: 现在是你说话残忍

translation.en: Try slitting your wrists with a pair of nail scissors.
translation.zh: 你用指甲剪割你的手腕试试

translation.en: You're not gonna wanna survive it, because it's embarrassing.
translation.zh: 你可不想活下来 因为太让人难堪了

translation.en: Don't worry.
translation.zh: 别担心

translation.en: I'm not so petty I throw it out in argument because I'm angry.
translation.zh: 我才不会小气到 跟人吵架生气的时候把这事拿出来说

translation.en: -I didn't mean it. -Too late.
translation.zh: -我不是故意要羞辱你的 -太迟了

translation.en: It's embarrassing and it's cruel,
translation.zh: 你说那种话让我难堪 而且残忍

translation.en: and it makes me regret sharing so much with you.
translation.zh: 我都后悔以前 跟你说了太多我自己的事

translation.en: -[crickets chirping] -[muttering] I'm keeping you…
translation.zh: 是我阻止你…

translation.en: Bullshit!
translation.zh: 胡说八道！

translation.en: How the fuck am I keeping you from a life?
translation.zh: 我他妈什么时候阻止过你 过你自己的人生？

translation.en: So stupid.
translation.zh: 太蠢了

translation.en: Fucking bullshit.
translation.zh: 胡说八道

translation.en: I know… I know what this is. This is bullshit.
translation.zh: 我知道她这些话是什么 是胡扯

translation.en: Fuck Malibu.
translation.zh: 去他妈的马里布

translation.en: What do you mean, "mediocre"?
translation.zh: 你说“平庸”是什么意思？

translation.en: Were you just trying to be mean?
translation.zh: 你说这话是不是只是为了恶心我？

translation.en: Is that why you said it?
translation.zh: 是不是这个原因？

translation.en: Out of everything I said,
translation.zh: 我刚说了那么多话

translation.en: "mediocre" is what stuck with you?
translation.zh: 你就只记得“平庸”两个字？

translation.en: I just wanna know if you actually believe it.
translation.zh: 我只想知道你是不是真心那么觉得

translation.en: Guess.
translation.zh: 你猜

translation.en: -Answer the question. -What is the question specifically?
translation.zh: -回答我的问题 -你的问题具体是什么？

translation.en: Do you not like the movie?
translation.zh: 你不喜欢我这部电影是吗？

translation.en: I never said that.
translation.zh: 我没说过

translation.en: -So you don't like me and the movie. -I never said that.
translation.zh: -你意思是我和这部电影你都不喜欢 -我没说过

translation.en: That's literally what you just fucking said.
translation.zh: 你刚才说的话就是这意思

translation.en: I feel like you're being a bit irrational.
translation.zh: 我觉得你现在有点不讲理

translation.en: I'm being irrational?
translation.zh: 我不讲理？

translation.en: I'm being fucking irrational? This is the biggest night of my life,
translation.zh: 我他妈不讲理？ 今晚是我人生最重要的夜晚

translation.en: and you're trying to turn it into the worst and I'm being irrational.
translation.zh: 可你硬弄成我这辈子最糟糕的夜晚 还说我不讲理

translation.en: Look at you.
translation.zh: 你看看你自己

translation.en: You're so solipsistic that you see yourself in everything.
translation.zh: 你太他妈以自我为中心 看什么都看到自己的影子

translation.en: Even in things you had nothing to do with.
translation.zh: 哪怕那东西和你八竿子打不着

translation.en: You notice the way Imani walks.
translation.zh: 你注意到了伊玛妮走路的样子

translation.en: You turn to me and say, "I wonder where you got that walk from."
translation.zh: 转头问我：“我好奇 这种走路姿态的灵感从哪里得到的”

translation.en: I don't say shit. I actually smile, don't I?
translation.zh: 我没回答你 只笑了一下

translation.en: Keep that shit light because I don't wanna hurt your feelings,
translation.zh: 让这事轻轻过去 因为我不想让你难受

translation.en: but you tally that shit up, Marie.
translation.zh: 可你总是要盘点这种事 玛丽

translation.en: While I'm actually doing something, creating something,
translation.zh: 在我真正做事情 真正在创造出新东西的时候

translation.en: you're on the sidelines trying to justify your motherfucking existence.
translation.zh: 你总是会在边上 把你他妈的存在合理化

translation.en: "I know that line." "I said that." "I did that." "You got that from me."
translation.zh: “我知道那台词” “那话我说过” “我做过那事” “你那个是学我”

translation.en: Shit, even feedback from you comes with an IOU, Marie.
translation.zh: 哪怕你给我什么反馈 都带着一种我欠你的感觉

translation.en: You wanna play fucking dirty?
translation.zh: 你想使坏是吗？

translation.en: Well, let's fucking go.
translation.zh: 那我们就来比一比吧

translation.en: You wanna hurt me, Marie.
translation.zh: 你想刺痛我 玛丽

translation.en: I promise you, I can hurt you ten times worse.
translation.zh: 我跟你保证 我要刺痛你的话 威力会是你的十倍

translation.en: You're a fucking featherweight, a level-one boss.
translation.zh: 搞这种事你完全是轻量级选手

translation.en: I can snap you like a twig.
translation.zh: 我能像折树枝一样把你折断

translation.en: Imani is based on you as much as she is on me.
translation.zh: 伊玛妮的原型有多少你的成分 就有多少我的成分

translation.en: What she says to the nurse,
translation.zh: 她跟护士说的那些话

translation.en: that's what I said to the doctor when my dad was in the ICU.
translation.zh: 是我爸进重症监护室时 我跟医生说过的话

translation.en: You noticed the way Imani walks, didn't you?
translation.zh: 你注意到了 伊玛妮的走路姿态 对吗？

translation.en: It's a good walk.
translation.zh: 那种姿态很好看

translation.en: That was my ex-girlfriend, Jess.
translation.zh: 我前女友杰茜就是那样走路的

translation.en: So was the scene on the bicycle in the rain.
translation.zh: 还有雨天单车上那场戏

translation.en: It wasn't based on the trip you and I took to Barcelona.
translation.zh: 那不是取材于 我们去巴塞罗那旅游那次

translation.en: That's Jess and I on the Citi Bike in Brooklyn.
translation.zh: 而是我和杰茜在布鲁克林 骑共享单车的场面

translation.en: The way she ties her shoes with two loops…
translation.zh: 伊玛妮把鞋带系成两个圈…

translation.en: That was Jayla.
translation.zh: 那是模仿婕拉

translation.en: You weren't the first.
translation.zh: 你不是第一个

translation.en: The joke about how she doesn't give handjobs.
translation.zh: 伊玛妮不帮男的打手枪那个梗…

translation.en: Well, that's an old played-out line that every nigga done heard before.
translation.zh: 是每个黑人都听过的老掉牙的话

translation.en: The joke she makes about how quickly she orgasms.
translation.zh: 伊玛妮调笑自己 很快就能高潮的那个梗…

translation.en: That was Kiki.
translation.zh: 是来自于奇奇

translation.en: Kiki.
translation.zh: 奇奇

translation.en: She's a dancer.
translation.zh: 她是个舞者

translation.en: Dancer. We'll call her a dancer.
translation.zh: 舞者 算她是个舞者好了

translation.en: Who I met outside of St. Louis on a road trip.
translation.zh: 是我有次公路旅行时 在圣路易斯郊外认识的

translation.en: I fucked the shit out of her in the penthouse suite of a Marriott.
translation.zh: 我在万豪酒店的顶层套房里 和她干得热火朝天

translation.en: Once on the bed, once in the shower.
translation.zh: 一次是在床上 一次是在浴室

translation.en: We might've even fucked in the closet or some shit too.
translation.zh: 可能我们在衣柜还是哪里都干了一次

translation.en: I got a Polaroid of her.
translation.zh: 我有一张她的宝丽来照片

translation.en: Sitting naked in a heart-shaped tub.
translation.zh: 她赤身裸体坐在心形浴缸里

translation.en: It's in a photo album at home in our closet.
translation.zh: 这照片现在都还放在 我们家衣柜的相册里

translation.en: But you're an addict, right?
translation.zh: 不过你是有毒瘾的人 对吗？

translation.en: That's what makes you so unique, right?
translation.zh: 所以你他妈独一无二 对吗？

translation.en: That's what makes your contribution so much more significant, right?
translation.zh: 所以你对这电影的贡献 重要得多 对吗？

translation.en: Get the entire fuck out of here.
translation.zh: 别他妈逗我了

translation.en: You're not the first broken girl I've known, fucked or dated.
translation.zh: 你不是我认识、上过床 或者约会过的第一个垮掉的女人

translation.en: I wrote my first script in a one-bedroom apartment with Leah,
translation.zh: 我的第一个剧本是和莉雅 住在一间单卧室公寓里时写的

translation.en: who I thought loved hour-long showers
translation.zh: 她在浴室一待就是一小时 我还以为她喜欢洗澡

translation.en: until I found her passed out with a fucking needle in her arm.
translation.zh: 直到有次我发现她在浴室里昏迷了 胳膊上还插着针筒

translation.en: Two years ago, I got an email from her sister
translation.zh: 两年前 我收到她姐姐的电邮

translation.en: saying she took a whole bottle of Tylenol to the head and passed away
translation.zh: 说她把一整瓶泰诺吃了下去 然后就死了

translation.en: and asked if I had any pictures
translation.zh: 她姐问我有没有她的照片

translation.en: 'cause she was putting together a slideshow on her behalf.
translation.zh: 因为她想给莉雅做幻灯片

translation.en: Now that I think about it, I should've thanked her tonight.
translation.zh: 我今晚其实还应该感谢她的

translation.en: She deserves it.
translation.zh: 这是她应得的

translation.en: Same with Tasha.
translation.zh: 塔霞也一样

translation.en: First girl I actually loved, I truly loved.
translation.zh: 她是我第一个真正爱过 真心爱过的女孩

translation.en: The first girl who truly broke my heart.
translation.zh: 第一个真正伤过我的心的女孩

translation.en: She never cheated on me. She's got that going for her.
translation.zh: 她没有对我不忠过 这点她很好

translation.en: She found Jesus, got married, got divorced.
translation.zh: 但她皈依了基督教 找人结了婚 后来又离了婚

translation.en: She constantly DMs me pictures of her daughter
translation.zh: 她经常把她女儿的照片发给我看

translation.en: saying she wished she had a child with me.
translation.zh: 说她希望能和我生一个孩子

translation.en: I send her heart emojis because I honestly don't know how to respond to that.
translation.zh: 我只回了她心形表情 因为我真的不知道该怎么回应她

translation.en: Are you done?
translation.zh: 你说完了吗？

translation.en: Not even fucking close.
translation.zh: 距离我说完还差得远呢

translation.en: Why, would you like me to stop?
translation.zh: 怎么？你是不是希望我打住？

translation.en: [quietly] No, Malcolm. Keep going.
translation.zh: 不是 你继续说吧

translation.en: -Why? -Hmm.
translation.zh: 为什么？

translation.en: 'Cause you like that shit?
translation.zh: 总不会是你喜欢听这些吧？

translation.en: You know how disturbed you are, Marie?
translation.zh: 你知道你的心理有多么畸形吗？

translation.en: You may have gotten clean, but you still haven't figured this part out.
translation.zh: 你毒瘾可能是已经戒了 但有件事你依然没想明白

translation.en: Why you love being hurt, traumatized and fucking eviscerated?
translation.zh: 就是你为什么喜欢被人刺痛 被人虐待 被人重创你的元气

translation.en: It's not normal.
translation.zh: 你这样不正常、不健康

translation.en: It's not healthy, and it permeates every aspect of our relationship.
translation.zh: 你这种模式已经弥漫到 我们关系的方方面面了

translation.en: The way we talk, the way we fight, the way we fuck.
translation.zh: 包括我们说话、吵架、做爱

translation.en: I've dated some damaged people in my life, Marie.
translation.zh: 我约会过一些支离破碎的人 玛丽

translation.en: But none of them wanted to be debased and degraded like you.
translation.zh: 但她们全都不会希望 堕落到你这种程度

translation.en: And honestly, Marie…
translation.zh: 老实说 玛丽

translation.en: it's nothing to be proud of.
translation.zh: 这不是什么值得自豪的事情

translation.en: So stop fucking smiling, 'cause you look like a clown.
translation.zh: 所以你他妈不要笑 你笑只显得你像个小丑

translation.en: Now there's some material for you.
translation.zh: 现在你有素材了

translation.en: You know what I just realized, Marie?
translation.zh: 你知道我刚才想明白什么了吗？

translation.en: It's not about justifying your existence.
translation.zh: 你的言行不是为了使你的存在合理化

translation.en: It's not.
translation.zh: 不是的

translation.en: It's about you being so scared and so selfish
translation.zh: 而是因为你特别恐惧、自私

translation.en: that you have to break me down.
translation.zh: 以至于要把我也搞崩溃

translation.en: Second guess everything I do.
translation.zh: 质疑我自己做的一切

translation.en: "Am I mediocre?"
translation.zh: “我平庸吗？”

translation.en: "Can I do this without her?"
translation.zh: “没有她的话我能干成这事吗？”

translation.en: "I don't know. I better ask Marie. Maybe Marie will know the answer."
translation.zh: “我不知道 我最好问一下玛丽 也许玛丽知道答案”

translation.en: "Where's Marie? I need Marie." That's a cut.
translation.zh: “玛丽去哪儿了？ 我需要她” 停拍一下

translation.en: "Marie, where did you go?"
translation.zh: “玛丽 你去哪儿了？”

translation.en: "Did you see that performance? What'd you think?"
translation.zh: “看到那个表演了吗？ 你觉得怎么样？”

translation.en: "You liked it? Yeah, me too."
translation.zh: “你喜欢啊 我也喜欢”

translation.en: God forbid I'm secure enough in my opinion that I don't need you.
translation.zh: 我绝不能对自己想法有充足的信心 非要有你在才行

translation.en: That's what this all is about.
translation.zh: 你和我吵其实就是为了这个

translation.en: Your whole speech about fake films.
translation.zh: 你那番有关不真诚的电影的阔论

translation.en: You just need a reason to be needed
translation.zh: 你需要一个被人需求的理由

translation.en: because if I don't need you, then what the hell am I doing with you, Marie?
translation.zh: 因为如果我不需要你 那我干嘛他妈和你在一起呢？

translation.en: You want control
translation.zh: 你想要掌控我们的关系

translation.en: because you can't imagine the reason I'm with you is because I love you.
translation.zh: 因为你不能想象 我和你在一起的原因只是因为我爱你

translation.en: I just love you, baby.
translation.zh: 只是因为我爱你 宝贝

translation.en: I don't need you.
translation.zh: 不是因为我对你有需求

translation.en: But I love you. That there's somebody on this planet that just loves you.
translation.zh: 我爱你 这个世界上 有人纯粹只是爱你

translation.en: I love the way your mind works, Marie.
translation.zh: 我爱你的思维方式 玛丽

translation.en: I do.
translation.zh: 确实是这样

translation.en: I love the way you see the world.
translation.zh: 我爱你观察这个世界的方式

translation.en: I love the way you think.
translation.zh: 我爱你的思考方式

translation.en: Your instincts.
translation.zh: 你的直觉

translation.en: And I'm so fucking grateful
translation.zh: 我非常感恩

translation.en: because everything that you've been through, everything…
translation.zh: 因为你经历过的一切 任何一切…

translation.en: That's what made you you. That's what made you you.
translation.zh: 这些才造就了今天的你

translation.en: The girl that I love, the girl that I fuck with,
translation.zh: 我爱的这个女孩 和我上床的这个女孩

translation.en: the girl that I'm up at 2:00 a.m. in the morning
translation.zh: 这个女孩害得我 在我人生最重要的这一天

translation.en: on the biggest night of my life because she's relentless. [laughing]
translation.zh: 凌晨两点还没睡觉 因为她不肯罢休

translation.en: And crazy.
translation.zh: 而且很疯

translation.en: [voice shaking] And I'm sorry, though. I'm sorry.
translation.zh: 但我知道是我不对 对不起

translation.en: I apologized, you know, and…
translation.zh: 我道过歉了…

translation.en: a thousand times. I know I fucked up.
translation.zh: 道歉一千遍了 我知道我搞砸了

translation.en: But honestly, the second we got home,
translation.zh: 可说真的 我们一回到家里

translation.en: all I wanted to do was celebrate with you, baby.
translation.zh: 我第一想做的事就是和你庆祝 宝贝

translation.en: Marie, my girl, the love of my life.
translation.zh: 和玛丽你 即我的人生挚爱庆祝

translation.en: You wanna know the part of Imani that's based on you?
translation.zh: 你想知道伊玛妮的故事 来源于你的部分在哪儿吗？

translation.en: It's the end.
translation.zh: 在电影结尾

translation.en: The part that makes it such a tragedy. The part…
translation.zh: 是这个部分令这个故事 成为一场悲剧 因为…

translation.en: that she…
translation.zh: 她…

translation.en: Where she loathes herself so much because of all the guilt and the shame.
translation.zh: 她心里充满了内疚和羞耻 因此无比讨厌自己

translation.en: That she can't let the good in.
translation.zh: 以至于不允许自己的人生美好

translation.en: That's the part that's based on you.
translation.zh: 这个部分就是来源于你

translation.en: Her inability to fathom
translation.zh: 她无法理解

translation.en: that there's someone on this planet Earth that just loves her.
translation.zh: 这个世界上有人纯粹只是爱她

translation.en: Despite her not loving herself.
translation.zh: 尽管她不爱她自己

translation.en: That's you.
translation.zh: 这就是你

translation.en: That's the part that isn't fiction.
translation.zh: 这就是这部电影非虚构的地方

translation.en: You gonna start smoking again?
translation.zh: 你又开始抽烟了？

translation.en: [Marie singing along] ♪ Get rid of him Uh-uh ♪
translation.zh: 甩掉他

translation.en: -♪ Get rid of him ♪ -♪ Oh, no ♪
translation.zh: -甩掉他 -哦 不

translation.en: [Marie singing along] ♪ But I love him ♪
translation.zh: 但我爱他

translation.en: [Malcolm] Fuck!
translation.zh: 操！

translation.en: That fucking piece of shit!
translation.zh: 真他妈垃圾！

translation.en: Fuck you! Fuck you! Fuck you! Fuck you! Fuck you!
translation.zh: 操！

translation.en: Fucking piece of shit! Fuck you!
translation.zh: 真他妈垃圾 操！

translation.en: -[Marie] What's going on? -Fuckin' LA Times review's up.
translation.zh: -怎么了？ -《洛杉矶时报》影评出来了

translation.en: -[Marie] Oh, shit. What does it say? -I don't know. Fucking Internet.
translation.zh: -天啊 怎么写的？ -我不知道 他妈的网络

translation.en: -[Marie] Is it good? -Hold on.
translation.zh: -是好评吗？ -等等

translation.en: -[Marie] Who sent it to you? -No one. I found it.
translation.zh: -谁发给你的？ -没有谁 我自己发现的

translation.en: -[Marie] How come no one sent it? -Marie, stop. It's loading.
translation.zh: -怎么会没人发给你？ -先别说话好吗？文章正在加载

translation.en: [Marie] All right. What's the headline?
translation.zh: 行 标题是什么？

translation.en: Oh, gotta pay a fucking paywall now? A fucking paywall? Really?
translation.zh: 现在还得他妈付费？逗我吗？

translation.en: [Marie] When was it posted?
translation.zh: 影评几时出来的？

translation.en: Dollar-ninety-nine a fucking month. Twenty minutes ago.
translation.zh: 每个月付1.99美元 20分钟前

translation.en: your megalomania, your egotistical view of the world.

translation.en: and your ability to love me.

translation.en: That's all.

translation.en: your authen-fucking-ticity you bring to this film. Thank you."

translation.en: and making my ungrateful ass some mac and cheese
